name: pcdtojpeg

screenshots.caption: The output of pcdtojpeg versus a typical converter

short_description: pcdtojpeg converts PCD (Kodak Photo CD) image files into high quality JPEG images. Conversions are at the maximum available PCD resolution, and are fully color managed - no blown highlights or color casts. A C++ PCD decoder library is also available.
